name: Jumboking
address: Paid Area, Sarojini Nagar Metro Station, Sarojini Nagar, New Delhi, Sarojini Nagar, New Delhi, New Delhi
description: Jumboking is a F&B-Casual Dining outlet that offers a wide variety of delicious and affordable Indian cuisine. The menu includes a variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, as well as a selection of desserts. The restaurant has a relaxed and inviting atmosphere, with comfortable seating and friendly staff. The food is freshly prepared and served with a smile. Jumboking is the perfect place to enjoy a delicious meal with family and friends.
